title: Rank system down ?
body: I can't find Solo que or flex is the rank system down ?

replies.body: Ranked is currently down in the lead-up to maintenance that begins at 1AM AEST this morning. Check out [this thread](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/kor6fXjT-oce-platform-maintenance-2017-05-10-100am-aest) for more details on the maintenance!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Zaps,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=gtorZOha,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-09T14:39:59.824+0000)
>
> Ranked is currently down in the lead-up to maintenance that begins at 1AM AEST this morning. Check out [this thread](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/kor6fXjT-oce-platform-maintenance-2017-05-10-100am-aest) for more details on the maintenance!

you have an alert button for a reason. would be fab if it was used.
This should be active with the information both here and in the client at the moment?
In the Client the active was only telling that there is an issue with chat system and we will fix soon, nothing mention about maintenance but whatever, no problem thank you :)

Odd - my client / site had the updated message - it should automatically update when the new message goes live. Can you let me know when you last logged in / what time you checked the ticker to see if I can track down what made the message not show for you?

at 12:30am Melbourne time was the last time i check the Active where it was just telling me about chat issue, before that i check around 11:15 or something same issue with chat only not mentioning about maintenance, i think its a bug where mostly client active forgot to deliver the message to their players

Not to mention we were notified of the maintenance days ago...

The new client is a bit buggy though. Half the time it says my friends are in a game when they actually aren't (and vice versa). A lot of in-client info isn't automatically updating/refreshing like it usually would requiring me to completely re-log.
I logged out and logged back in, and my alert message still only shows the chat issue. It does not mention anything about maintenance.
IT is not, seeing as there are posts about it on the forums.
